name: n8n-chatbots-heroku-deploy
description: Deploy n8n docker container to heroku

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_USER.description: This username will be required to you each time you access to the tool.

N8N_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: This password will be required to you each time you access to the tool.

N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Your secret keys will be encrypted with this key in your database. A strong key will be auto generated.

APP_NAME.description: Your app name. Must be equal to the name that you introduced in 'App name' field.
